abstract.text: Streamlined interaction with Last.fm on Apple platforms

inlineContent.text: ScrobbleKit is a Swift package that simplifies the integration of Last.fmâ€™s API across all the Apple platforms, enabling the creation of applications that interact seamlessly with the popular music platform.

This package encompasses a comprehensive set of Last.fm API methods, providing developers with the tools to perform essential tasks such as scrobbling tracks, retrieving user charts, obtaining detailed album information, and supporting a wide range of other functionalities available in the Last.fm API catalog.
To begin using ScrobbleKit, you can check out our
guide for an easy introduction. Alternatively, you can select one of the topics below to go through specific functionalities in ScrobbleKit with step-by-step instructions.

abstract.text: Represents an artist that is similar to the one returned by the Last.fm API.
Represents information about a track on an userâ€™s Loved Tracks list.
Retrieves the corrected artist and track names for a given track name and artist name.
Searches for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance.
Streamlined interaction with Last.fm on Apple platforms
Represents information about an artist retrieved from Last.fm, providing details such as name, playcount, and images.
A model representing a wiki entry.
Represents information from an album in Last.fm, providing details such as name, artist, playcount, and tags.
Represents an image that may be returned from a Last.fm API call.

Retrieves a list of tags associated with a given track.
Adds tags to an artist asynchronously.

A struct representing the corrected information after a track update now playing request.
Retrieves the top tags for a given track.
